entry.title: Maximum Subarray in Blind 75 (5)
entry.content:
Maximum Subarray

Description

Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray (containing at least one number) which has the largest sum and return its sum.

Example 1

Input: nums = [-2,1,-3,4,-1,2,1,-5,4]
Output: 6
Explanation: [4,-1,2,1] has the largest sum = 6.

Example 2

Input: nums = [1]
Output: 1

Example 3

Input: nums = [5,4,-1,7,8]
Output: 23

Constraints

  • 1 <= nums.length <= 3 * 10^4
  • -10^5 <= nums[i] <= 10^5

Thoughts

Use simple DP to solve this problem. The key is to find the relationship between the current element and the previous element.

  1. In local_max, we can either add the current element(nums[i]) to the previous element(local_max) or just use the current element(nums[i]).
  • if we add the current element to the previous element,it represents that we are still in the same subarray,and the current element is the last element of the subarray.
  • if we just use the current element, it represents that we are starting a new subarray.
  1. In global_max,to get the maximum subarray, we just need to compare the current local_max with the previous global_max.

complexity: O(n)

Code

Discussion

  1. Determine nums[i] is suitable for being the first number。如果max()選了nums[i]，代表i這個位置適合當第一位數字;如果選了nums[i]+local_max，代表可延續下去，這時的nums[i]為答案陣列的第二位。

  2. If last number is negative,the local_max will choose to be in the same array,so original sum will be smaller.Thus,we need to have the global_max to compare with the local_max.

Tips & Concepts

Array=[-2,-3,4,-1,-2,1,5,-3]

entry.title: Maximum Product Subarray in Blind 75 (6)
entry.content:
Maximum Product Subarray

Description

Given an integer array nums , find a contiguous non-empty subarray within the array that has the largest product, and return the product.

Example 1

Input: nums = [2,3,-2,4]
Output: 6
Explanation: [2,3] has the largest product 6.

Example 2

Input: nums = [-2,0,-1]
Output: 0
Explanation: The result cannot be 2, because [-2,-1] is not a subarray.

Constraints

  • 1 <= nums.length <= 2 * 10^4
  • -10 <= nums[i] <= 10
  • The product of any prefix or suffix of nums is guaranteed to fit in a 32-bit integer.

Thoughts

Use simple DP to solve this problem. The key is to find the relationship between the current element and the previous element.If we met a negative number, we need to swap the max and min.

Code

Discussion

Similar to Maximum Subarray

Tips & Concepts

  1. std::swap (No return value)

swap(a,b) 該函數接受兩個必須交換的必需參數a和b。參數可以是任何數據類型(int , string…)。

entry.title: Two Sum in Blind 75 (1)
entry.content:
Two Sum

Description

Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution , and you may not use the same element twice.

You can return the answer in any order.

Example 1

Input: nums = [2,7,11,15], target = 9
Output: [0,1]
Explanation: Because nums[0] + nums[1] == 9, we return [0, 1].

Example 2

Input: nums = [3,2,4], target = 6
Output: [1,2]

Example 3

Input: nums = [3,3], target = 6
Output: [0,1]

Constraints

  • 2 <= nums.length <= 10^4
  • -10^9 <= nums[i] <= 10^9
  • -10^9 <= target <= 10^9
  • Only one valid answer exists.

Thoughts

We can use a Hashmap to store the value and index of each element in the array. Then we can iterate through the array and check if the target minus the current element is in the Hashmap. If it is, we return the index of the current element and the index of the element in the hash table. If not, we add the current element and its index to the Hashmap.

Time Complicity: O(n)

Code–V1

Code–V2(with const auto&)

Discussion

Q1. 為甚麼要把array的值放進map的key，而不是放進value呢？
A1. 因為map.find(a)可以在map中重複尋找為a的key，所以才把原陣列的值放進map的key，而不是放進value。

Q2. 為甚麼要用map呢？
A2. 因為map可以在O(1)的時間內找到key，所以才用map。

Tips & Concepts

  1. ans[0]為之前在map中找到的value，ans[1]為目前的i。(注意順序)
  2. for(const auto& s : range), 當你只想讀取range裡面的元素時，使用const auto& (range 可為array, vector, string, map, set等等)
  3. map的key為s.first, value為s.second

if in map,use s.first, s.second

if in vector,use s

  1. map的find()會回傳一個iterator，如果找不到，則會回傳map.end()。

  2. iterator的解構方式為(*it).first 或 it->first

  3. auto 關鍵字讓編譯器去推導該變數類型，所以不用寫出變數類型，但是要注意，auto 關鍵字只能用在變數宣告時，不能用在函式回傳值的宣告上。

  4. iterator(auto 等於 map<int,int>::iterator )向量 and map 可使用迭代器來呼叫其元素

  5. reverse iterator(auto 等於 map<int,int>::reverse_iterator )向量 and map 可使用反向迭代器來呼叫其元素

entry.title: Product of Array Except Self in Blind 75 (4)
entry.content:
Product of Array Except Self

Description

Given an integer array nums, return an array answer such that answer[i] is equal to the product of all the elements of nums except nums[i].

The product of any prefix or suffix of nums is guaranteed to fit in a 32-bit integer.

You must write an algorithm that runs in O(n) time and without using the division operation.

Example 1

Input: nums = [1,2,3,4]
Output: [24,12,8,6]

Example 2

Input: nums = [-1,1,0,-3,3]
Output: [0,0,9,0,0]

Constraints

  • 2 <= nums.length <= 10^5
  • -30 <= nums[i] <= 30
  • The product of any prefix or suffix of nums is guaranteed to fit in a 32-bit integer.

Thoughts

we can use two vectors to store the product of the elements before and after the current element. Then we can iterate through the array and multiply the product of the elements before and after the current element to get the answer.

Code

Tips & Concepts

  1. vector<int> v1(10); 產生一個長度為10的vector，並且初始化為0
  2. vector<int> v2(10, 1); 產生一個長度為10的vector，並且初始化為1
  3. vector<int> v3={10,20,30,40,50};/n vector<int> v4(v3); 以 v3 作為引數來建構 v4
  4. vector<int> v5(v3.begin(),v3.begin()+2); 以 v3 的前兩個元素來建構 v5

v3.begin()+2 代表從 v3 的第 0 個元素開始，取 2 個元素(第三個不算)

  1. vector<int> v6(v3.end()-2,v3.end()); 以 v3 的後兩個元素來建構 v6

entry.title: Contains Duplicate in Blind 75 (3)
entry.content:
Contains Duplicate

Description

Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears at least twice in the array, and return false if every element is distinct.

Example 1

Input: nums = [1,2,3,1]
Output: true

Example 2

Input: nums = [1,2,3,4]
Output: false

Example 3

Input: nums = [1,1,1,3,3,4,3,2,4,2]
Output: true

Constraints

  • 1 <= nums.length <= 10^5
  • -10^9 <= nums[i] <= 10^9

Thoughts

We can use a map to store the value and index of each element in the array. Then we can iterate through the array and check if the current element is in the map. If it is, we return true. If not, we add the current element and its index to the map.

use map.insert() to insert a pair into the map.

  1. If the key already exists, it will return a pair with the iterator pointing to the existing element and a bool value of false.
  2. If the key does not exist, it will return a pair with the iterator pointing to the new element and a bool value of true.

Code

Discussion

Q1. why we use !retPair.second instead of retPair.second?
A1. if retPair.second is false,it means the element already exists in the map,so return true

Tips & Concepts

  1. use map.insert() to insert a pair into the map.

map.insert(pair<int,int>(nums[i],i));

  1. pair’s usage in map (elementary)

entry.title: f-string的獨特性
entry.content:
f-string 簡介

稱爲格式化字串常數（formatted string literals），是Python3.6新引入的一種字串格式化方法。

  • 該方法源於PEP 498 – Literal String Interpolation
  • 主要目的是使格式化字串的操作更加簡便
  • f-string在形式上是以 f 或 F 修飾符引領的字串（f'xxx'或 F'xxx'），以大括號 { } 標明被替換的欄位

f-string在本質上並不是 字串常數，而是一個在執行時運算求值的表達式

選擇原因

f-string在功能方面不遜於傳統的%-formatting語句和str.format()函數，同時 效能 優於二者，且使用起來簡潔明瞭 ，因此對於Python3.6及以後的版本，推薦使用f-string進行字串格式化。

entry.title: 如何安裝好GCC?
entry.content:
編譯器 (Compiler)

GNU Compiler Collection(GCC)Clang
支持編譯C、C++及GO等程式語言，目前最流行 的編譯器Based on LLVM(Low Level Virtual Machine)，支援C、C++、Objective-C，more faster

GNU Compiler Collection(GCC)💥💥

1. 開放原始碼(open source)的跨平台compiler

2. Windows,Mac,Linux的安裝方法各異

Windows🪟MacLinux
可透過安裝Mingw(Minimalist GNU on Windows)安裝GCC內建Clang，直接佔領gcc指令使用指令安裝

Minimalist GNU on Windows - Mingw

  • 將GCC編譯器移植到Windows平台
  • 在官網下載


如何打開cmd🤔

在Windows打開cmd

在Mac打開terminal

在Mac上執行下列其中一項操作:

  • 按一下Dock中的 「啟動台」 圖像，在搜尋欄位中輸入 「終端機」 ，然後按一下終端機。🛎️
  • 在Finder中，打開 「應用程式/工具程式」 檔案夾，然後按兩下終端機。🛎️

如何測試GCC是否有裝好?

  1. 打開cmd or terminal
  2. 輸入 gcc -v
  3. 如果 安裝成功 ，可以看到安裝路徑和版本資訊

找不到GCC?

環境變數沒設定好 !!

  1. 點開環境變數，找到 變數path ，按編輯✅
  2. 在電腦中找到之前所下載的 mingw64/bin ，複製路徑，新增到環境變數中的path內✅

    cmd要記得重開 🔥

怎麼截圖?🤔

Shift+Windows+s

cmd+Shift+4

GCC指令-1

Why is -o in this code? 🙋

Answer:

-o < file > Write output to < file >

e.g. gcc helloworld.c -o helloworld.exe

GCC指令-2

Why is && in this code? 🙋

Answer:

This command will run the new program only if it compiles successfully.If there’s a problem with the compile,it will skip running the program and simply display the errors on the screen.

&& here means “and then if it’s successful,do this”

entry.title: 陳盈倩(cathy)的履歷
entry.content:
陳盈倩❤️

對於升學考試具有經驗，也有相對應的準備方法&策略 ~

國立中央大學資訊管理學系 一年級
110 學測考生
110 指考考生

電話: 0906638247
Line ID: cathychen0327
Email: catcathy0327@gmail.com

國小:全科/伴讀
國中:全科/伴讀
高中:數學、英文、國文作文

1. 到府授課
2. 咖啡廳
3. 線上教學

學業表現📜

［國文&國文作文］🗒️

  • 110 學測國文 14 級分（頂標為 13 級分），作文 38.5 分
  • 國中教育會考作文 5 級分
  • 作文曾刊登在 未來少年上
  • 全國聯合盃 作文比賽各縣市初賽，曾 代表新竹市 去參加全國複賽
  • 國中時曾獲全校作文比賽第一名，代表學校 去參加全市作文比賽

［數學］🧮

  • 高中兩年連續榮獲 校內數學科競試第一名
  • 高三 榮獲數理及資訊學科能力競賽數學科校內選拔第二名
  • 高三 代表全校參加台灣省北二區數理及資訊學科能力競賽 的數學科複賽
  • 指考數甲達頂標

教學經驗🏛️

  • 竹女高三學測生-數學
  • 線上家教-國文作文

現在學生

  • 國一英文

自我介紹&教學風格😉

  1. 個性開朗活潑，喜歡和學生對話，藉由對話，了解學生的想法，並找出錯誤觀念加以導正
  2. 國中和高中，經常於課間和課後下課時間，指點同學學業
  3. 指考完，為一些正面臨 111 新課綱大考的學弟妹們，解題和分享讀書方法

運用生動有趣的方法，引導學生瞭解並掌握重要觀念

分享自己讀書方法及做筆記方式，培養學生的自學能力

考完學測和指考，對於升學考試具有經驗，也有相對應的準備方法&策略

各科策略📿

數學英文作文
一開始先引導學生理解最基本的觀念，再融會貫通，不用死記繁雜公式及各種題型 ，在面對千變萬化的考試題目就不會慌張！運用自己獨門的背單字技巧取代傳統死記單字本裡的中文解釋，搭配大量閱讀文章，除了訓練學生閱讀速度及摘錄文章重點的能力外，還會適時補充相關單字、片語、文法及時事新聞 。引導學生解析文章和題目，並找出其關鍵詞句，使學生具備正確的審題技巧；分析作文架構，讓學生能自己寫出一篇有邏輯且架構完整的文章 ；引領學生發想出特別的題材，並訓練學生在短時間安排好特別取材的段落安排；補充優美詞彙及佳句，讓學生的文章有畫龍點睛之效果。

競賽證明🎖️

entry.title: CH1 認識C語言
entry.content:
Why C?👍

IEEE spectrum (IEEE綜覽) comes with the listing sheet of top🔝 programming language 2021. The list of the programming language is based on popularity.

C can help!💁🏻

1. Need to write high-performance code for a new game
2. Program an Arduino
3. use that advanced third-party library in your iPhone app
4. C is a language for small, fast programs

C works at a much lower-level than most other languages

it creates code that is a lot closer to what machines really understand 💡

🔎 Understanding C gives you a much better idea of what is really going on
🔎 C can even help you better understand other languages as well

C’s history of development

  • C was developed at AT&T Bell Laboratories in the early 1970s
  • C was derived from a language called B, hence the name C to indicate it is a successor of language B(BCPL)

    The B language cannot handle these objects of different sizes, nor does it provide a separate operator to operate on them.

The characteristics of C

高效率的編譯式語言

為 編譯式語言 ，執行速度遠比直譯式快

直譯器(interpreter)編譯器(compiler)
一次編譯一個敘述，然後執行，佔用的記憶體較少，但執行的速度會變慢將整個程式碼編譯成機器碼(machine code)，然後執行

中階語言

介於高階與低階之間的語言

  • C 語言兼具低階語言的優點，與高階語言的特色
    🔥低階語言如組合語言與機器碼，適合電腦閱讀
    🔥高階語言貼近人類語言習慣，如BASIC，適合人類閱讀

靈活的控制流程

可以容易的設計出具有結構化 及模組化 的程式語言

可攜性佳🏋️‍♀️

  • 想 跨平台來執行C語言 ，通常只要修改極少部分的程式碼，再重新編譯即可執行
  • C語言可以直接依 記憶體的位址來存取變數 ，以提高程式執行的效率

The way C works

1. Source:

You start off by creating a source file.The source file contains human-readable C code.

2. Compile:

You run your source code through a compiler.The compiler checks for errors,and once it’s happy,it compiles the source code.

3. Output:

The compiler creates a new file called an executable.This file contains machine code,a stream of 1s and 0s that the computer understands.And that’s the program you can run.

C語言與其他程式之間的關係

C++ 與 Java 均是以 C 為根基，再加上 OOP 技術，使得它們活躍於視窗與網路程式設計

程式規劃與實作的流程

  • 規劃程式
  • 撰寫程式碼及註解
  • 編譯程式碼
  • 執行程式
  • 除錯與測試
  • 程式碼的修飾與儲存

程式的錯誤

找出錯誤的過程稱為除錯(debug)

語意錯誤(semantic error)語法錯誤(syntax error)
程式的執行結果不是預期結果;執行才知，如想要算1+1，輸出卻是3程式中有不合語法的敘述，Compile時通常就會知道，如main拼成maan

原始程式編譯及連結的過程

目的檔(Object file)函數庫(Library)連接程式(Linker)
存目的碼的檔案 。 目的碼是由編譯器產生的代碼，通常是機器碼;產生最終可執行的程式檔的中間產物;通常完成最終檔案的生成後，會自動被刪掉將一些常用的功能集中;方便二次使用;可透過連結程式與其他目的檔/函式庫連接組合使用連接目的檔們 (Object files);連接函數庫們 (Libraries);產出最終的可執行檔案

pros and cons of C
